means: 监工，工头，使人卖力工作的严厉的人

list.abs: 狗头人工头(Kobold Taskmaster): 加速光环(Speed Aura)对移动速度提升从15%下降至12%.  半人马可汗(Centaur Khan): 取消了耐久光环(Endurance Aura)对移动速度.
He is a hard taskmaster ., 他是个严苛的监工.
a stern taskmaster , teacher , parent , etc., 严厉的监工 , 教师 , 父亲等.
Once Saturn , the teacher - taskmaster planet , leaves , you will be done with boot camp ., 一旦土星 , 这教父一般的星星离开后 , 你将结束你在训练营的生活.

entry.def: If you refer to someone as a hard taskmaster, you mean that they expect the people they supervise to work very hard.

example.ex: They're both tough taskmasters, but Stephen is much more supportive.
example.tran: 他们俩都是严厉的工头，不过斯蒂芬更喜欢帮助他人。

means.word_mean: 1. someone who imposes hard or continuous work

auth_sentence.content: There is no doubting Di Canio is a hard taskmaster.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is no doubting Di Canio is a hard taskmaster.

sentences.en: The profession of medicine is a stern taskmaster.
sentences.cn: 医生这个职业总要求其从事者承担繁重的任务。
